level.heading: Events causing dissolution.
level.text: A statutory trust shall be dissolved only by:
An administrative dissolution under §§ 29-106.01 and 29-106.02; or
The filing of articles of dissolution under § 29-1208.02:
On the occurrence of an event or circumstance that the governing instrument states causes dissolution; or
With the approval of all the beneficial owners.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 801 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
